title: from_seurat_to_h5mu
description: Converts a Seurat file into an H5MU file.

Dataset input.title: Dataset input
Dataset input.description: Dataset input using nf-tower "dataset" or "data explorer". Allows for the input of multiple         parameter sets to initialise a Nextflow channel.

param_list.description: Dataset input can either be a list of maps, a csv file, a json file, a yaml file, or simply a yaml                 blob. The names of the input fields (e.g. csv columns, json keys) need to be an exact match with the workflow input parameters.

assay.description: Name of the assay to be mapped.

modality.description: Name of the modality to be created.

output.help_text: Type: `file`, multiple: `False`, required, default: `"$id.$key.output.h5mu"`, direction: `output`, example: `"output.h5mu"`.

layers_mapping.description: Mapping of Seurat's Layers to AnnData layers

obs_mapping.description: Mapping of Seurat's observation columns to AnnData obs columns

var_mapping.description:
Mapping of Seurat's feature rows to AnnData var columns.
If True, all features will be mapped by name

uns_mapping.description: Mapping of Seurat's Misc to AnnData uns

obsm_mapping.description: Mapping of Seurat's Embeddings to AnnData obsm fields

varm_mapping.description: Mapping of Seurat's Loadings to AnnData varm fields

obsp_mapping.description:
Mapping of Seurat's Graphs to AnnData obsp fields.
If True, all fields will be mapped by name

varp_mapping.description: Mapping of Seurat's Misc to AnnData varp fields

x_mapping.description: A string specifying Seurat's Layer to mapped to the .X slot, If not provided, no data will be copied to the .X slot.

nextflow input-output arguments.title: Nextflow input-output arguments
nextflow input-output arguments.description: Input/output parameters for Nextflow itself. Please note that both publishDir and publish_dir are supported but at least one has to be configured.
